title: Philippe Coutinho reveals joy at playing with Neymar just days after Barca ace told him to quit Liverpool
text:
EFL Cout above Philippe Coutinho reveals joy at playing with Neymar just days after Barca ace told him to quit Liverpool 
Brazilian duo will be in action against in their World Cup qualifier against Paraguay on Tuesday By Richard Forrester Comments PHILIPPE COUTINHO has spoken of his admiration for Brazil team-mate Neymar. 
It comes just days after the Barcelona star told reporters he wants Coutinho to quit Liverpool and join him at the Nou Camp. Getty Images 2 Philippe Coutinho reveals his joy at playing alongside Neymar for Brazil 
And whilst Neymar described Coutinho as a ‘total fit’ at Barcelona, the Reds ace has described how easy it is to play alongside his international compatriot. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Liverpool news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Speaking ahead of Brazil’s World Cup qualifier against Paraguay, Coutinho said: “Look, Neymar is outstanding as we can all see. 
“He is a player that decides key games, a guy fundamental on our team. 
“We have been together for a long time, since we played together at youth level. Playing next to him is easy, he can change the game easily. 
“We give the ball to him and he solves the problem.” Getty Images Neymar recently told reporters that he wants Philippe Coutinho to join him at Barcelona most read Not good enough Antonio Conte has sensationally rejected the chance to sign Neymar in a £155m deal from Barcelona leg-break horror Seamus Coleman set for surgery on potential career-threatening injury after his leg is snapped in half by Neil Taylor's wild tackle TV TIMES What TV channel is England vs Lithuania on, what time is kick-off and what is the latest team news? Brazil are flying through their qualification group and sit seven points ahead of Uruguay in second. 
And Coutinho believes the manager, Tite, is doing a great job with the squad. 
He added: "Obviously everyone is following Tite's work - he is doing a great job. So this just makes us more confident. 
"As you saw in the stadium, there was a lot of positive energy. So it is really good for us."
